We build high-quality FiveM scripts for your server. Z-DOCS is the central hub for all our resource documentation, including our powerful Z-Core bridge and real-time Z-Admin dashboard.

Works with your existing framework

ESX·QBCore·ox_core·Standalone
Z-Core

One Bridge. Every Framework.

Z-Core automatically detects whether you're running ESX, QBCore, ox_core, or Standalone — and adapts instantly. Zero configuration changes required on your part.

  • Auto-detects your framework on startup
  • Unified player, job, and inventory API
  • Drop in and go — no server.cfg editing
Read the Z-Core Docs →
exports.tsTS
const player = exports['z-core']
  .GetPlayer(source)

player.name   // "John_Doe"
player.job    // { name: "police", grade: 2 }
player.money  // { cash: 5000, bank: 200 }
player.coords // { x: 123.4, y: -456.7, z: 28.1 }

// Works identically on ESX, QBCore, ox_core
const framework = exports['z-core']
  .GetFramework() // "esx" | "qb" | "ox" | "standalone"
Z-Core

Developer API that doesn't get in your way.

Clean exports and server events. Whether you're building a custom script or extending Z-Core, the API stays consistent regardless of the framework underneath.

  • Exports for player data, jobs, money, coords
  • Server events for inventory and framework hooks
  • Full TypeScript-friendly structure
View Exports & Events →
exports.tsTS
const player = exports['z-core']
  .GetPlayer(source)

player.name   // "John_Doe"
player.job    // { name: "police", grade: 2 }
player.money  // { cash: 5000, bank: 200 }
player.coords // { x: 123.4, y: -456.7, z: 28.1 }

// Works identically on ESX, QBCore, ox_core
const framework = exports['z-core']
  .GetFramework() // "esx" | "qb" | "ox" | "standalone"
Z-Admin

Your server. At a glance.

The interactive live map shows every online player in real-time — with job-based color coding, blip clustering, and one-click teleport or inspection.

  • Real-time player positions with job colors
  • Click any blip to inspect, spectate, or teleport
  • Auto-refreshes without page reload
Live Map Docs →
Z-Admin

Full control. One click away.

Kick, ban, heal, give items, edit inventories, manage vehicles — every admin action is available directly from the player panel. No in-game commands needed.

  • Full inventory & vehicle management
  • Permanent ban with reason and audit trail
  • Search players by name, ID, or license
Player Management Docs →
Z-Admin

Security that doesn't sleep.

The built-in security engine monitors for suspicious patterns, blocked exploits, and logs every admin action with timestamps. Your audit trail is always ready.

  • Real-time exploit and anticheat detection
  • Full admin action audit log
  • Discord webhook alerts on critical events
Security Docs →
